about_the_game:
About This Demo Version

「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」is a 2.5D pixel action roguelike game. The story centers on the fateful battle between Koishi Komeiji and Hata no Kokoro.

  • In「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」》Demo,You can experience the following content:

    -You can experience 6 difficulty levels (the full version is planned to have a total of 15).

    -Only default weapons (with attached skills) are available. Skill upgrade enhancements can be unlocked normally, but they cannot be upgraded to their maximum level.

    -Most of the item cards currently designed can be used normally, but upgrades are limited. The full version may include more item cards (the exact number is yet to be determined).

    -There are 5 types of enemies designed, but due to the difficulty level restrictions, you can experience 4 of them.

   -It supports cooperative multiplayer for up to 4 players. Welcome to Gensokyo to experience this thrilling and fun adventure!
detailed_description:
About This Demo Version

「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」is a 2.5D pixel action roguelike game. The story centers on the fateful battle between Koishi Komeiji and Hata no Kokoro.

  • In「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」》Demo,You can experience the following content:

    -You can experience 6 difficulty levels (the full version is planned to have a total of 15).

    -Only default weapons (with attached skills) are available. Skill upgrade enhancements can be unlocked normally, but they cannot be upgraded to their maximum level.

    -Most of the item cards currently designed can be used normally, but upgrades are limited. The full version may include more item cards (the exact number is yet to be determined).

    -There are 5 types of enemies designed, but due to the difficulty level restrictions, you can experience 4 of them.

   -It supports cooperative multiplayer for up to 4 players. Welcome to Gensokyo to experience this thrilling and fun adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: 2+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」 is a Touhou fangame.This is a "reverse-construction" action rogue-lite.Koishi vs. Kokoro! But as the playable character, Koishi uses various enhancement cards to continuously strengthen Kokoro. Can she ultimately defeat the Kokoro she has built up herself?
